summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Chez Loman restaurant website. All core functionality working perfectly including homepage, navigation, menu filtering, gallery, contact page, admin panel, and WhatsApp integration.
passed_tests: All 25 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section, daily menu, featured dishes, reviews
Navigation works for all pages (Menu, À Propos, Galerie, Contact, Admin)
Menu page displays all dishes with working category filters (28 total items)
Gallery page shows photos with category filtering (6 photos total)
Contact page displays hours, address, WhatsApp buttons, Google Maps
Admin page - Daily Menu creation with date, items, special message
Admin page - Gallery photo addition with URL, caption, category selection
WhatsApp floating button visible and properly positioned on all pages
Menu category filters: All (28), Plats Ivoiriens (8), Grillades (8), Spécialités (6), Boissons (6)
Gallery category filters: All (6), Restaurant (2), Clients (4), Plats (0), Ambiance (0)
CRUD operations for daily menu and gallery photos working
Error handling for invalid API requests (404 responses)
Restaurant info endpoint returning correct data
